A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was absolutely the worst ever made. Absolutely threw away all of the original goodness and made it a movie for kids and to make money. It might be better than a half star movie vs all movies but within the Star Wars franchise this is a more than fair rating. Save your money and wait for it to be free on tv....in like a week. Disney should put out an apology for making it and put it on free tv so everyone knows what a mistake is.
